channel.title: Pisses me off
channel.description: It really pisses me off seeing these botting website owners saying that there bots will be back up. They are basically saying "We will be back soon to fuck up the game" I swear if I known these developers IRL i'd knock their scummy teeth in. And all the fucking 10 year old kids saying "Plz bots soon" shit like that. *Facepalm* they need to fuck off.

item.title: Pisses me off
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

i doubt they’ll be back any time soon or ever (especially taking into account undetectability)

Read full topic

item.title: Pisses me off
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Don’t worry, the only bot that will be out anytime soon (Anytime soon as in 6 months minimum) would be RiD, they just suffer a little at each graphics update.

Read full topic

item.title: Pisses me off
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Really? If I were these developers id only allow 1 bot to run per computer and not allow bots for things like barrows/gwd, and set the max botting time to 6-7 hours a day. They would basically be playing the same amount as any other player and not fuck anything up. And this wouldn’t be a big deal for those people who bot because they’re focused on school etc. If you feel like that^^ wouldn’t be right, consider yourself a hardcore botter and no one likes you.

Read full topic
